languages.text: "Я видела твой внутренний мир, элантах. Не слишком ли многое ты пускаешь в самое свое сердце?" {n}Легкий смешок срывается с уст эльдарки.{/n} "И все же отрадно знать, что ты не запер{mf||ла} для меня свою душу".

"I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."
languages.original_text: "Я видела твой внутренний мир, элантах. Не слишком ли многое ты пускаешь в самое свое сердце?" {n}Легкий смешок срывается с уст эльдарки.{/n} "И все же отрадно знать, что ты не запер{mf||ла} для меня свою душу".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting in too much into your very heart?"{n} A short laugh escapes the Aeldari's lips{/n} "Still, it's good to know that you didn't lock your soul away from me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting in too much into your very heart?"{n} A short laugh escapes the Aeldari's lips{/n} "Still, it's good to know that you didn't lock your soul away from me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我曾经见过你的内心世界，外界人。在你的世界里，‘重要的部分’是不是太多了？”{n}伊莉耶特轻声笑道。{/n}“不过，你没有就此与我产生隔阂，我依然非常高兴。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: “我曾经见过你的内心世界，外界人。在你的世界里，‘重要的部分’是不是太多了？”{n}伊莉耶特轻声笑道。{/n}“不过，你没有就此与我产生隔阂，我依然非常高兴。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «He visto tu mundo interior, elantach. ¿No te basta con lo que tienes ya ahí dentro metido?». {n}Una breve risita brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Aun así, me complace saber que no me has cerrado las puertas de tu alma».
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: «He visto tu mundo interior, elantach. ¿No te basta con lo que tienes ya ahí dentro metido?». {n}Una breve risita brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Aun así, me complace saber que no me has cerrado las puertas de tu alma».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vu votre monde intérieur, elantach. Ne seriez-vous pas en train de m'y laisser une place un peu trop importante ? {n}demande-t-elle, puis elle pousse un petit rire.{/n} Je suis tout de même heureuse de voir que vous ne cherchez pas à m'interdire votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu votre monde intérieur, elantach. Ne seriez-vous pas en train de m'y laisser une place un peu trop importante ? {n}demande-t-elle, puis elle pousse un petit rire.{/n} Je suis tout de même heureuse de voir que vous ne cherchez pas à m'interdire votre âme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Eure innere Welt gesehen, Elantach. Lasst Ihr nicht zu viel in Euer Herz hinein?" {n}Ein kurzes Lachen entgleitet Yrliets Mund.{/n} "Dennoch ist es gut, zu wissen, dass Ihr Eure Seele nicht vor mir verschlossen habt."
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Eure innere Welt gesehen, Elantach. Lasst Ihr nicht zu viel in Euer Herz hinein?" {n}Ein kurzes Lachen entgleitet Yrliets Mund.{/n} "Dennoch ist es gut, zu wissen, dass Ihr Eure Seele nicht vor mir verschlossen habt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタよ、我はお前の内面を見た。お前は心の内を晒しすぎではないか？」{n}ユリエットの唇から短い笑いが漏れる。{/n}「それでも、お前がその魂を我から遠ざけてはいないとわかったのは良かった」
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、我はお前の内面を見た。お前は心の内を晒しすぎではないか？」{n}ユリエットの唇から短い笑いが漏れる。{/n}「それでも、お前がその魂を我から遠ざけてはいないとわかったのは良かった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Senin iç dünyanı gördüm ben elantach. Çok fazla şeyin yüreğinin derinliklerine girmesine izin vermiyor musun?" {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından kısa bir kahkaha kaçıyor.{/n} "Yine de ruhunu bana kapatmadığını bilmek güzel."
languages.original_text: "I have seen your inner world, elantach. Aren't you letting too much into the very heart of you?" {n}A short laugh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "Still, it is good to know that you have not locked your soul away from me."

traits.locale_text: "Senin iç dünyanı gördüm ben elantach. Çok fazla şeyin yüreğinin derinliklerine girmesine izin vermiyor musun?" {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından kısa bir kahkaha sıyrılıyor.{/n} "Yine de ruhunu bana kapatmadığını bilmek güzel."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
